name: Evertale,the Pandraconium and the war of five Antares
name_original: Evertale,the Pandraconium and the war of five Antares
description: After the end of Evertale the plot was interrupted at the saga of Pandraconium.  This game wants to expand and ultimate Evertale plot , ending the saga of Pandraconium,  the Radiant world and the Requiem world with a classic rpg esperience with horror elements
